mapper.select: SELECT substring(`user_joindate`,1,10) as date , count(substring(`user_joindate`,1,10)) as week_cnt FROM student WHERE user_joindate >=#{date} AND user_joindate <=(select curdate()) GROUP BY substring(`user_joindate`,1,10)
SELECT date_cnt_date as date , date_cnt_d_cnt as week_cnt FROM date_cnt WHERE date_cnt_date >=#{date} AND date_cnt_date <=(select curdate()) group by date_cnt_date
Select count(*) as totalCount From student
Select date_cnt_d_cnt From date_cnt WHERE date_cnt_date =(select curdate())
Select count(substring(`user_joindate`,1,10)) as date From student WHERE substring(`user_joindate`,1,10) = (select curdate())
